message: Hello Bob, I have a unique product that I think you might be interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate it. I am willing to pay $100 for it.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can see if I can do a bit better than my initial offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the current market, I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
I can see you're pushing for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. I can sell the product to you for $105.
